HOSP.name: Hospital
HOSP.desc:
You wake up in an eerie hospital bed. 
There is a window to your left 
and a door in front of you.

HOSPW.name: WINDOW
HOSPW.desc: You see an abandoned city and below the window a parking lot.

HOSPD.name: DOOR
HOSPD.desc:
You made it to the hallway. 
Infront of you is the exit to the parking lot. 
There is a strange noise coming from the room to your right.

items.desc: There is a baton leaning against the door.
items.take: You take the baton near the door.

ZOMROOM.name: HOSPITAL ROOM
ZOMROOM.desc: You are attacked by a zombie like creature and die.

PARKL.name: PARKING LOT
PARKL.desc:
You are outside of the hospital in the parking lot. The atmosphere feels off and the city is quiet. 
You get in your car and drive towards home. 
Home is ahead, there is a supermarket on the way.

HOME.name: HOUSE
HOME.desc:
As you drive through the city, there are signs of a massive emergency. 
The tv is on when you arrive and you hear that there has been an outbreak that has caused the population to turn into zombies. 
You have all the supplies to barricade your house. 
There is a call on your radio for a survior community in the woods.
